name: Platformer school project
description:
Have you ever wanted to play as Madeline from celeste in an shitty unity platformer with unlocked rotation and zelda music playing in the background? No? But now you can.  Denmark brings your health down. Skåne brings it up. Don't fall off and don't press the exit button.

Control her with the mouse buttons and space and collect all coins to progress to the next level. Level 2 is impossible just so you know. 

Controller compatible!! Move with the left analog stick and jump with Y.
